author: MikeHolm
post_text: June 26, 2016 at 6:03 PM#1Hi guysI have turned every stone, but still haven't been able to find a way for a macro to trigger the distribution of content between VPU's.I have attached two images, that might help understand what I would like the macro to doDoes anybody know if it is possible at all to perform this task by macro/commandline or possibly a LUA script ??ThanksMike HolmFilesVPU Macro Pics.zip130.2 kB – 594 Downloads
title: Macro to distribute VPU content
